title: Mediterranean Grilled Tomatoes
ingredients: ['4 tomatoes, cut into 5mm slices', '4 tablespoons olive oil', '1 teaspoon sea salt', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper or to taste', '4 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '1 pinch monosodium glutamate (optional)', '3 tablespoons chopped fresh oregano', '60g freshly grated Parmesan cheese']
